title: hey are the project chests/boxes for ever?
body: hey are the project chests/boxes for ever ?

replies.body:
The PROJECT caches are to be pulled from the store after the PROJECT: DISRUPTION event ends after the 16th of this month. The crafting materials for this event (caches, cores, blueprints, etc) will remain in your crafting inventory even after the event. If you'd prefer to clean up your Hextech Crafting materials inventory, you'll have a chance to disenchant the leftover materials for a bit of essence. 

For complete deets, check out our [event FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.

any eta about how much essence it will give?

Have a friend who already owned the project skin he get so he was wondering what was the best option, crafting the blueprint and disenchant for essence or disenchant print and core for essence.

also, can we still craft after the event if we keep the mat√©rial ? (without the border of course)

Yes, you can still craft after the event, you just won't be able to get new materials from caches, as they'll be pulled from the store.

I don't have any details regarding how much essence you'll get for disenchanting any of these materials, unfortunately.

If you were to hang onto them unopened, there's no way they'd just disappear, but I suspect they won't be available in the store any more after this event ends.

That said, you raise an interesting point about materials; I wonder if the Augment Core Cache Fragments and PROJECT Cores left over from the event will just sit there collecting dust, or if they'll automagically disappear or transform at some point for relevance...
